statements: SELECT * FROM Sculptures WHERE year_created = 2021;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, year_created FROM Sculptures WHERE artist_name = 'Michelangelo';
SELECT sculpture_name, dimensions, material_used FROM Sculptures WHERE material_used = 'marble';
SELECT artist_name, year_created FROM Sculptures ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, material_used FROM Sculptures ORDER BY sculpture_name ASC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, year_created FROM Sculptures WHERE year_created > 2000 ORDER BY sculpture_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sculptures WHERE artist_name LIKE '%Vincent%' ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, dimensions, material_used FROM Sculptures WHERE material_used = 'Bronze' ORDER BY sculpture_name ASC, year_created DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, dimensions FROM Sculptures WHERE dimensions LIKE '%x%y%' ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(sculpture_id) AS total_sculptures FROM Sculptures GROUP BY artist_name HAVING total_sculptures > 2 ORDER BY total_sculptures DESC;
SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, dimensions FROM sculptures;
SELECT artist_name, material_used FROM sculptures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, nationality, birth_year FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'French';
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name FROM sculptures WHERE material_used='Marble';
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE nationality='Italian' AND birth_year>1800;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS sculpture_count FROM sculptures GROUP BY artist_name ORDER BY sculpture_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM sculptures ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists JOIN sculptures ON artists.artist_name=sculptures.artist_name GROUP BY artist_name, nationality HAVING COUNT(*)>2;
SELECT * FROM sculptures WHERE artist = 'Michelangelo';
SELECT name, material FROM sculptures WHERE height > 10;
SELECT id, name, artist FROM sculptures ORDER BY artist DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM sculptures WHERE material = 'Marble' AND width < 5;
SELECT artist, COUNT(id) AS sculpture_count FROM sculptures GROUP BY artist HAVING COUNT(id) > 1;
SELECT name, artist, material FROM sculptures WHERE height > 10 AND width < 5;
SELECT * FROM sculptures WHERE artist='Leonardo da Vinci';
SELECT name, material, dimensions.height, dimensions.width FROM sculptures JOIN dimensions ON sculptures.id = dimensions.sculpture_id;
SELECT sculptures.name, materials.name AS material_name FROM sculptures JOIN materials ON sculptures.material = materials.id;
SELECT artist, SUM(height) AS total_height FROM sculptures GROUP BY artist ORDER BY total_height DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT name, artist, year FROM sculptures WHERE year > 2000;
SELECT name, artist, materials FROM sculptures WHERE artist = 'Pablo Picasso';
SELECT name, artist FROM sculptures WHERE dimensions LIKE '%x%';
SELECT name, year, dimensions FROM sculptures ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM sculptures WHERE artist = 'Michelangelo';
SELECT name, year FROM sculptures WHERE year > 1500 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT artist, COUNT(id) AS num_sculptures FROM sculptures GROUP BY artist HAVING num_sculptures > 3;
SELECT name, materials FROM sculptures WHERE materials LIKE '%marble%' AND dimensions LIKE '%cm%';
SELECT museums.name AS museum_name, exhibitions.name AS exhibition_name FROM museums JOIN exhibitions ON museums.id = exhibitions.museum_id;
SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT name, artist FROM sculptures WHERE material = 'Marble';
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'French';
SELECT name, description FROM sculptures WHERE dimension = 'Small';
SELECT id, name, style FROM artists ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, artist FROM sculptures WHERE material = 'Marble'
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'Italian' ORDER BY birth_year DESC
SELECT name, dimension, material FROM sculptures WHERE dimension LIKE '%x%' AND material != 'Wood'
SELECT sculptures.name AS sculpture_name, artists.name AS artist_name FROM sculptures JOIN artists ON sculptures.artist = artists.id
SELECT museums.name AS museum_name, sculptures.name AS sculpture_name FROM museums JOIN sculptures ON museums.id = sculptures.id
